TopicTitle: Info Windows In The Tutorial/ The Game Are Too Small To Read

Articles.Content:
Dear Developers, 

I know you are currently working on KSP 2 but please take some time and enlarge the text in the Info windows in the tutorial/Original KSP. 
I need to stick my face into the screen in order to read it which is not very convenient, and I tired other resolutions but it just makes it all blurry.
As a newbie to this game I want to say I am amazed by the details and accuracy of this game, and already looking forward for KSP 2. 
But for now, as I am playing the original KSP, doing so will make a much greater gameplay experience for me and for the other new comers. 

Thank you very much for your time and work you put into this! 

Kosta

@kosta I agree, maybe there should be a text size slider in the settings.

(also, the developers of KSP aren't working on KSP 2 as well. They're 2 separate teams).
Try increasing the UI scale in the main menu settings, or reducing the screen resolution which effectively makes things bigger.
Pretty sure you can change the UI size in the escape menu settings. I remember playing on 4k on a laptop and being able to read basically everything but alt-F12 without squinting.
